import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ChevronLeft, Download, Play, FileText, Cpu, Database, Shield } from 'lucide-react'; const GenerateStep = ({ formData, updateFormData, nextStep, prevStep }) => { const [isGenerating, setIsGenerating] = useState(false); const [generationStatus, setGenerationStatus] = useState(''); const handleGenerate = async () => { setIsGenerating(true); setGenerationStatus('Initializing Lambda functions...'); // Simulate Lambda execution steps const steps = [ 'Analyzing infrastructure requirements...', 'Running infrastructure-analyzer Lambda...', 'Validating AWS credentials and permissions...', 'Designing optimal architecture with AI...', 'Calculating cost estimates...', 'Generating CloudFormation templates...', 'Setting up resource provisioner Lambda...', 'Configuring monitoring and alerts...', 'Infrastructure ready for deployment!' ]; for (let i = 0; i < steps.length; i++) { await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500)); setGenerationStatus(steps[i]); } setIsGenerating(false); }; const getSelectedCount = (array) => (array || []).length; return (

); }; export default GenerateStep;
